Introduction

Shin Dong Geun, popularly known as Peniel, is a Korean-American Singer under BTOB Company. Peniel is the Lead Rapper and Vocalist of the group BTOB, he was the last to join the group when they were still trainees.

He made his debut as a member of BTOB on March 21, 2012 with their first single "Insane".
